Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a buff-coloured pottery vessel, the fabric is light-brown in section, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip and remains of two lines of black-painted hieratic text.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Great Aten Temple (el-Amarna), north wall TA:32-33/18
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393995) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393995)
